# Tasklist Generator Command

Generate high-level tasks and gated sub-tasks from a PRD, with agent assignments, commit/PR strategy, and relevant files..

## Usage

```
/tasklist-generator
```

## What It Does

This command invokes the `tasklist-generator` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.

## Skill Reference

This command invokes: `@skills/tasklist-generator`

See `@skills/tasklist-generator/SKILL.md` for full documentation and `@skills/tasklist-generator/reference.md` for examples.
